sentences.en: After the wind died down, the wind also a smooth stone unabated.
sentences.cn: 风停息后, 风动石也随之平稳如初.

sentences.en: Calls to abandon the use - and - toss type began more than 10 years ago and have persisted unabated.
sentences.cn: 要求放弃“用了就扔掉”生活方式的呼声10多年前就出现了,而且自那时起有增无减.

sentences.en: His medicines had failed ; the fever was unabated.
sentences.cn: 他的药剂未起作用.热度未减.

sentences.en: In the meantime, crime continues unabated.
sentences.cn: 同时, 犯罪率并没减少.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, the melting of the glaciers in the Northern Hemisphere unabated.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 在北半球的冰川融化有增无减.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, the uprising in Punjab has proceeded unabated.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 旁遮普省的骚乱有增无减.

sentences.en: Teachers, although much praise since ancient times, but still poor unabated.
sentences.cn: 老师, 虽自古为人称颂, 却依然清贫如初.

sentences.en: That's a hidden cost which can rise unabated and composite system that is difficult to use.
sentences.cn: 这里面就会涉及一些潜在成本,并且可能导致整合过后的系统操作更加困难.

sentences.en: The conflict in Darfur continues unabated.
sentences.cn: 达尔富尔的处突持续不减.

sentences.en: The fighting has continued unabated for over 24 hours.
sentences.cn: 激战已经持续了24小时以上。

sentences.en: The hurricane swept on, its strength unabated.
sentences.cn: 飓风继续猛力向前推进,风力丝毫不减.

sentences.en: The storm continued unabated throughout the night.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨持续了一夜，丝毫没有减弱。

trans.tran_en: continuing without becoming any weaker or less violent
